name: Super Mario Odyssey Safari
summary:
Mario's off on a globe-trotting adventure!
Or, he would be if not for some faulty wiring. Explore the mysterious Bonefall Island to find a way to Fossil Falls. From the flowery peaks of Sakura Armory to the forgotten depths of Legend Forest, forge your path through this action packed open-world platformer with familiar gameplay from the hit Super Mario Odyssey.
